Desc.entry: Methodist church with a variety of activities taking place.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 10.45am & 1st Sun in the month at 6.30pm, Tues 10-11.30am (Kids and Cuddles), 6.30-7.30pm (Rainbows and Brownies), 7.30-8.45pm (Guides), Wed 10am-1.15pm (Polly Parlour - food, fairtrade products, sandwiches and soup - see separate entry), Thurs 6.30-7.45pm (Boys Brigade), 7-10pm (model railway group), Fri 7.30-9.30pm (Boys Brigade), 2nd Sat in the month (coffee morning). Except for yoga, please just turn up at the venue for these events
